verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Strength will rise as we wait upon the Lord, newline wait upon the Lord, newline as we wait upon the Lord newline Strength will rise as we wait upon the Lord, newline wait upon the Lord, newline We will wait upon the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Our God You reign forever newline Our hope our strong Deliverer

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You are the everlasting God newline The everlasting God newline You do not faint and you won't grow weary newline You're the defender of the weak newline You comfort those in need newline You lift us up on wings like eagles
